extension.news: [B][COLOR red]Update - v6.5.1 - Feb. 25, 2022[/COLOR][/B] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Some updates to Collection sets that were missing some newer titles.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Collections gui now has a new menu item called [B]"Search TMDb Collections"[/B].[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] The IMDb meta check setting has been split into two. You can now enable/disable for Movies and Shows. Shows is off by default due to some titles IMDb causes issues with.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Movie lists now has a new Context Menu option called [B]"Browse Collection"[/B] that is visible IF the listItem belongs to a TMDb Collection. The option, if visible, will then load the TMDb Collection listItems.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Using the Context Menu option [B]"Find Similar"[/B] will no longer return to Venom's main menu but instead return you to the list you left off at.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] It's been noted that in Kodi Matrix "Action(Queue)" fails to add a complete shows episodes, or a single season episodes, at the given level to the Kodi playlist. Adding to Kodi's playlist/Queue in Matrix seems to only work at the espisode level for a single item. I've confirmed this works as intended on Leaia(18) but no longer works on Materix(19). Therefore until I settle on a solution these context menu items are removed at show and season level.[/I]
